EmailTemplate.name: Independent's Guide.IG Lead Email 5
EmailTemplate.subject: The Independents Guide from MBO Partners: Calculate Your Bill Rate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, How long has it been since you evaluated how much you are billing your clients? To help you stay up-to-date, MBO Partners presents How Much Should I Charge <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/plan/how-much-should-i-charge>? This 22-page downloadable guide will provide both basic information and advanced techniques for setting the perfect bill rate.
This is another part of our fast-growing Independent's Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide>, the online library of educational content for independent workers.
Please donâ€™t hesitate to contact MBO Partners if you have questions or suggestions for new content. ___________________________________ MBO Partners t: 703-793-6000 e: info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
